ArXiv

Data Processing

Fetch and search research papers from the ArXiv repository. Access scientific literature, abstracts, and metadata for research and analysis purposes.

1.0.0 Version
10 Actions
Jan 15 Updated
Python Language

Installation Methods

Global Installation

uv pip install scientific-mcps

Individual MCP Installation

uv pip install "scientific-mcps[arxiv]"

Direct Server

uv run mcp_arxiv

Claude Desktop Configuration

{ "mcpServers": { "arxiv": { "command": "uv", "args": ["run", "mcp_arxiv"] } } }

Available Actions

  • search_arxiv
    Search ArXiv for research papers by category or topic
    Parameters: query (default: "cs.AI"), max_results (default: 5)
  • get_recent_papers
    Get recent papers from a specific ArXiv category
    Parameters: category (default: "cs.AI"), max_results (default: 5)
  • search_papers_by_author
    Search ArXiv papers by author name
    Parameters: author (required), max_results (default: 10)
  • search_by_title
    Search ArXiv papers by title keywords
    Parameters: title_keywords (required), max_results (default: 10)
  • search_by_abstract
    Search ArXiv papers by abstract keywords
    Parameters: abstract_keywords (required), max_results (default: 10)
  • search_by_subject
    Search ArXiv papers by subject classification
    Parameters: subject (required), max_results (default: 10)
  • search_date_range
    Search ArXiv papers within a specific date range
    Parameters: start_date (YYYY-MM-DD, required), end_date (YYYY-MM-DD, required), category (optional), max_results (default: 20)
  • get_paper_details
    Get detailed information about a specific ArXiv paper by ID
    Parameters: arxiv_id (required)
  • export_to_bibtex
    Export search results to BibTeX format for citation management
    Parameters: papers_json (JSON string, required)
  • find_similar_papers
    Find papers similar to a reference paper based on categories and keywords
    Parameters: reference_paper_id (required), max_results (default: 10)

Usage Examples

Literature Search

// Search for papers on machine learning search_papers( query: "machine learning quantum computing", category: "quant-ph", max_results: 10, sort_by: "relevance" ) // Fetch specific paper details fetch_paper( arxiv_id: "2301.12345", include_abstract: true, include_authors: true ) // Get paper metadata get_metadata("2301.12345", ["title", "authors", "published", "categories"])

Research Workflow

// Search for recent papers search_papers("computational physics", max_results: 20) // Extract paper data for analysis papers_data = [] for paper in results: metadata = get_metadata(paper.id) papers_data.append(metadata) // Analyze with pandas load_csv(papers_data) describe(dataframe, ["publication_date", "citation_count"])
